tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar yalan söylemek zorunda kaldıkları kimselerden nefret ederler
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgiye saplanıp kalmaya verdim. Nefret, taşımak için çok ağır bir yük.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bizden nefret edenlerden nefret etmeden yaşayalım. Gelin, bizden nefret edenler arasında nefretten kurtulmuş olarak yaşayalım.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Çaresizliğimizin bilincine vardığımız andan itibaren gerçek anlamda nefret etmeyi öğreniyoruz. Bu trajik bir an; en tüyler ürpertici ve en iğrenç an.
tr_quotes.author: Yasmina Khadra

tr_quotes.quote: Birinden nefret etmek, insanın kendi içine kurt koyması demektir. Hayatını kemirir.
tr_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

tr_quotes.quote: Kin bir tuzak, çünkü bizi hasmımıza fazlasıyla bağlıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, ya korktukları, yahut da gıpta ve haset ettikleri şeylerden nefret ederler.
tr_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

tr_quotes.quote: Açıkça nefret etmek, asıl düşüncesini gizlemekten daha asil bir harekettir.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Kin, hiçbir zaman kinle söndürülememiştir. Sadece iyi niyet, kini yok eder. Bu değişmez bir kanundur.
tr_quotes.author: Dhampamada

tr_quotes.quote: Kin, zayıfların öfkesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Alphonse Daudet

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi acımız bize, başkalarının kinini bölüşmeyi öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Kinlenmeyin… Kin kalbinizi karartır
tr_quotes.author: Bedirhan Gökçe

tr_quotes.quote: Kin ve sevgi kör değildir; fakat taşıdıkları ateşten gözleri görmez olur
tr_quotes.author: F. Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Kin duygusu, mutluluğa zarar verir. Sevgiyi azaltır, zamanın ve enerjinin boşa harcanmasına sebep olur.
tr_quotes.author: Nevzat Tarhan

tr_quotes.quote: Nefret, öyle muazzam bir duygudur ki, insanın içindeki her şeyi geriye kül yığını kalana kadar yakıp atar.
tr_quotes.author: Tarryn Fisher

tr_quotes.quote: Nefretler, fikirlerin değil, mizaçların çarpışmasından meydana gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Seni inciten kimse özür dilerse, kabul et, kin tutma
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Nefret kendini cezalandırmaktır. Sen onlardan nefret edince kendilerini kötü hissettiklerini mi sanıyorsun?
tr_quotes.author: Michelle Cohen Corasanti

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı kimseler birinden nefret etmeden başkasını sevemezler.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Nefretin bize zarar veren insana saldıran bir silah olduğunu düşünürüz.Ama nefret kıvrık bir bıçak gibidir. Ve aynı zararı kendimize de veririz.
tr_quotes.author: Mitch Albom

tr_quotes.quote: Bir toplum gerçeklerden ne kadar uzaklaşırsa gerçeği söyleyenlerden o kadar nefret eder.
tr_quotes.author: George Orwell

tr_quotes.quote: Herhangi bir kimseyi kıskanmaktan, ya da kin beslemekten kurtaracak sihirbaz henüz yeryüzüne gelmiş değil
tr_quotes.author: Alain

tr_quotes.quote: Beni özgürlüğe kavuşturacak kapıdan geçerken,öfkeyi ve nefreti geride bırakmazsam,hapiste kalmaya devam edeceğimi biliyordum.
tr_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

tr_quotes.quote: Kinimiz arttıkça, kin beslediğimiz kişiden daha çok küçülürüz
tr_quotes.author: La Rochefoucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Benden nefret edenlerden nefret edecek vaktim yok. Çünkü ben, bana değer verenleri sevmekle meşgulüm.
tr_quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

tr_quotes.quote: Kin kalpten, küçümseme ise düşüncelerden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Olmadığım biri gibi davranıp sevilmektense, kendim olup nefret edilmeyi tercih ederim
tr_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

tr_quotes.quote: Nefret hiçbir zaman nefretle yok edilemez. Nefret sevgiyle yok edilir bu ölümsüz kanundur.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, aşağı gördüğü sürece değil, yalnızca eşit ya da yüksek gördüğünde nefret eder.
tr_quotes.author: F. Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgi her zaman karşılık görür, kin de
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Gülüşlerimi çalanlar, her daim ağlamaya mahkum kalsınlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya aşık olursun ya da nefret edersin. Ben sende ikisini de başardım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nefrete sevgiden daha çok güveniyorum çünkü nefretin sahtesi olmaz!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşman kelimesinin anlamını arkadaş sıfatıyla taşıyanlardan öğrendim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nefret ettiğim insanları bile seviyormuş gibi yapıyorsam gönlümün güzelliğindendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kimine duadır kimine beddua. Kime ne yaşattıysan sen de onu yaşa…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Cüzdanın değil, yüreğin büyük olsun arkadaş.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başımızda karabulut ancak içimizde vardır hep bir umut.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Asıl büyük kayıp yaşarken içimizde ölenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar yalan söylemek zorunda kaldıkları kimselerden nefret ederler.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Verdiği umudu geri alan aldığı ahı da güle güle kullansın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nefrete sevgiden daha fazla güvenirim çünkü nefretin sahtesi olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben her zaman amin der susarım. Dua’m belli, duyan belli…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir insan için ağlamaya değmez. Çünkü değen insan zaten ağlatmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Anlamayanlar için dilim, sevmeyenler için yüreğimi yordum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tıp ne kadar ilerler ise ilerlesin, ar damarındaki çatlağı tedavi edemez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya aşık olursun ya da nefret edersin. Ben sende ikisini de başardım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nasıl yaşarsan öyle ölürsün. Öyle bir yaşa ki Rabbim, kulum senden razıyım desin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan yaşadıkça anlıyor ki; kendi kayığını kendin çekmezsen bir yerlere gidemiyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kurduğun hayal alarm gibi olmalı; muhakkak bir gün bir saat bir an gerçekten çalmalı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kişi Allah’tan başka kimseye ihtiyacı olmadığına inanırsa; Allah da onu başkasına muhtaç etmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her nefretin içinde mutlaka bir mazi vardır ve her nefreti uyandıran mutlaka bir acının eseridir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne aşklar vardır kim bilir yaşanmayı bekleyen ne aşıklar vardır kim bilir yaşadıklarından nefret eden.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gülmek her zaman mutlu olmak için değildir. Bazen öyle gülmeler vardır ki; en büyük acıları gizlemek içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Basit yaşayın. Cömertçe sevin. Dürüstçe konuşun ve her gün dua edin. Her şeyin nasıl düzeleceğini göreceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nefret olmadıkça sevginin değeri anlaşılmaz İçimizdeki nefreti biz değil, karşımızdakinin yapacağı hal ve hareketler ayarlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: If you cannot be positive, then at least be quiet.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: You’re going to have haters and you’re going to have lovers.
en_quotes.author: Nicole Polizzi

en_quotes.quote: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
en_quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

en_quotes.quote: Behind every successful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
en_quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

en_quotes.quote: Haters are the people who will broadcast your failures and whisper your success.
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: Isn’t it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?
en_quotes.author: Sean Covey

en_quotes.quote: The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.
en_quotes.author: Criss Jami

en_quotes.quote: People will always have their opinion on you despite who you are and what your capable of.
en_quotes.author: Ana Chable

en_quotes.quote: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
en_quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

en_quotes.quote: Expect while reaching for the stars, people to whirl by with their dark clouds and storm upon you.
en_quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

en_quotes.quote: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.
en_quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

en_quotes.quote: I don’t have time, energy, or interest in hating the haters; I’m too busy loving the lovers.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: I don’t worry about the haters… They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: It’s amazing the lies that people will believe about men when the truth is actually much more interesting.
Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
en_quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

en_quotes.quote: Some people have so little going on in their lives, they would rather discuss yours.
Remember, people only rain on your parade because they’re jealous of your sun and tired of their shade.
Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
en_quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

en_quotes.quote: Insecure people put others down to raise themselves up.
en_quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

en_quotes.quote: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
en_quotes.author: Scylar Tyberius

en_quotes.quote: To hate everything is to be wounded by everything.
en_quotes.author: Marty Rubin

en_quotes.quote: Pride attracts more haters and brings less friends.
A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24/7. So, if you’re expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again.
en_quotes.author: Sonya Parker

en_quotes.quote: Wish all your enemies a long life, so they can see you succeed in life.
en_quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

en_quotes.quote: Remember that only God can judge us; forget the haters, because Somebody loves you.
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: If you don’t like me, why do you waste your time making fun of me?
en_quotes.author: Chad Anderson

en_quotes.quote: I treat my haters like am radio, I just don’t listen to them.
If you’re not a tree hugger, then you’re a what, a tree hater?
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: The best way to counter-attack a hater is to make it blatantly obvious that their attack has had no impact on you.
en_quotes.author: Timothy Ferris

en_quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
en_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

en_quotes.quote: Hate is too great a burden to bear. It injures the hater more than it injures the hated.
en_quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

en_quotes.quote: Has anything you’ve done made your life better?
en_quotes.author: American History X

en_quotes.quote: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
en_quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

en_quotes.quote: Love me or hate me. Either way I’m on your mind.
Hating is the sincerest form of flattery.
Remember, people who try to bring you down are already below you.
They don’t hate you. They hate themselves and take it out on you. There’s a difference.
en_quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

en_quotes.quote: When people don’t want the best for you, they are not the best for you.
en_quotes.author: Gayle King

en_quotes.quote: Haters may push you but determination will give you the keys to drive.
en_quotes.author: Gee Linder

en_quotes.quote: There’s always going to be someone who doesn’t like you.
Being judged by others means that you’re that important that they have the time to think about you and talk about you.
So many assume. So little know.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Animals don’t hate, and we’re supposed to be better than them.
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him.
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and don’t care about haters.
Jealousy is the best compliment you can receive!
Don’t doubt yourself, that’s what haters are for.
Keep away from those who try to belittle your ambitions.
Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: Any fool can criticize, condemn and complain… and most do.
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: People will always have their opinion on you despite who you are and what your capable of.
en_quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

en_quotes.quote: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
en_quotes.author: Tavi Gevinson

en_quotes.quote: Often those that criticize others reveal what he himself lacks.
en_quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

en_quotes.quote: We can’t control the filters that others choose when they look at us
en_quotes.author: Rachel Wolchin

en_quotes.quote: Isn’t it kind of silly to think that tearing someone else down builds you up?
en_quotes.author: Sean Covey

en_quotes.quote: When people don’t want the best for you, they are not the best for you.
en_quotes.author: Gayle King

en_quotes.quote: If they disrespect you to your face imagine what they’re doing behind your back.
en_quotes.author: Sonya Parker

en_quotes.quote: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
en_quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

en_quotes.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
en_quotes.author: Bette Midler

en_quotes.quote: Your friends will believe in your potential, your enemies will make you live up to it.
en_quotes.author: Tim Fargo

en_quotes.quote: Haters are the people who will broadcast your failures and whisper your success.
en_quotes.author: Will Smith

en_quotes.quote: Haters don’t hate you… The reality is, they fear that they will never be able to get to where you are right now.
en_quotes.author: Leah Remillet

en_quotes.quote: There will always be haters. And the more you grow the more they hate; the more they hate the more you grow.
en_quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

en_quotes.quote: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
en_quotes.author: Scylar Tyberius

en_quotes.quote: Behind every successful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
en_quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

en_quotes.quote: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
en_quotes.author: Scylar Tyberius

en_quotes.quote: People will always have their opinion on you despite who you are and what you’re capable of.
en_quotes.author: Ana Chable

en_quotes.quote: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
en_quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

en_quotes.quote: When you have haters, you’re doing something right.
en_quotes.author: Kylie Bunbury

en_quotes.quote: Haters are confused admirers who can’t understand why everybody else likes you.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: Haters don’t hate you. They hate themselves because you’re a reflection of what they wish to be.
en_quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

en_quotes.quote: Remember, people only rain on your parade because they’re jealous of your sun and tired of their shade.
Haters are my favorite. I’ve built an empire with the bricks they’ve thrown at me. Keep on hating.
en_quotes.author: C.M. Punk

en_quotes.quote: Haters are gonna hate, but haters are also going to click on your YouTube video just to watch it. Even if you were watching just to hate on me, and now I hold the record, so I win.
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
en_quotes.author: Karina Barton

en_quotes.quote: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.
en_quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

en_quotes.quote: To hate everything is to be wounded by everything.
en_quotes.author: Marty Rubin

en_quotes.quote: Behind every successful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
en_quotes.author: Gloria Tesch

en_quotes.quote: The best way to counter-attack a hater is to make it blatantly obvious that their attack has had no impact on you.
en_quotes.author: Timothy Ferris

en_quotes.quote: They don’t hate you. They hate themselves and take it out on you. There’s a difference.
en_quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

en_quotes.quote: Haters will say what they want, but their hate will never stop you from chasing your dream.
en_quotes.author: Justin Bieber

en_quotes.quote: Love your haters – they’re your biggest fans.
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: I don’t have time, energy, or interest in hating the haters; I’m too busy loving the lovers.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: Haters may push you but determination will give you the keys to drive.
en_quotes.author: Gee Linder

en_quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
en_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

en_quotes.quote: Some people hate you because of the way other people love you.
When you have haters, you’re doing something right.
en_quotes.author: Kylie Bunbury

en_quotes.quote: Now my haters are very high-class people, so I feel like I’ve moved up.
en_quotes.author: GloZell

en_quotes.quote: The haters always scream the loudest.
en_quotes.author: Tucker Max

en_quotes.quote: Don’t try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer.
en_quotes.author: Scott Stratten

en_quotes.quote: If you don’t have haters, you’re doing something wrong.
en_quotes.author: Molly Qerim

en_quotes.quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
en_quotes.author: Karina Barton

en_quotes.quote: Stop feeding haters with your attention. They don’t deserve it.
Hate hurts the hater more’n the hated.
en_quotes.author: Madeleine L’Engle

en_quotes.quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
Be careful who you open up to. Only a few actually care, the rest are just curious.
Don’t trip over haters, step over them.
en_quotes.author: Darrin Lowery

en_quotes.quote: Don’t worry about people that aren’t happy for you. They probably aren’t happy for themselves.
Whoever is trying to bring you down is already below you.
Negative people need drama like oxygen. Stay positive; it will take their breath away.
Insecure people put others down to raise themselves up.
en_quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

en_quotes.quote: Thanks for making me the center of your attention.
